    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Varnost v prometu - naravoslovni dan</string>
            <string language="en">Traffic safety - natural science day</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verkehrssicherheit - natürlicher Wissenschaft Tag</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sécurité routière - jour normal de la science</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Segurança de tráfego - dia natural da ciência</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sicurezza stradale - giorno naturale di scienza</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ασφάλεια κυκλοφορίας - ημέρα φυσικής επιστήμης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Seguridad de tráfico - día natural de la ciencia</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Za ta dan je dobro izbrati teden otroka. Če se igraš \"limonce in hruške\" imej manjšo skupino učencev.</string>
            <string language="en">Organizing natural science day regarding the traffic safety. Visit from local policeman, walk around the city, recognizing signs, ...</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">varnost</string>
            <string language="en">safety</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">promet</string>
            <string language="en">traffic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">naravoslovni dan</string>
            <string language="en">natural science day</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">igra</string>
            <string language="en">play</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">policaj</string>
            <string language="en">policeman</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Organisierender natürlicher Wissenschaft Tag 
betreffend die Verkehrssicherheit. Besuch vom lokalen 
Polizisten, Weg um die Stadt, Zeichen erkennend...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jour normal d'organisation de la science concernant
la sécurité routière. Visite du policier local, promenade 
autour de la ville, identifiant des signes...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dia natural organizando da ciência a respeito da 
segurança de tráfego. Visita do polícia local, caminhada em 
torno da cidade, reconhecendo sinais...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Giorno naturale d'organizzazione di scienza per 
quanto riguarda la sicurezza stradale. Chiamata dal poliziotto 
locale, camminata intorno alla città, riconoscente i segni...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οργάνωση της ημέρας φυσικής επιστήμης σχετικά με την 
ασφάλεια κυκλοφορίας. Επίσκεψη από τον τοπικό αστυνομικό, 
περίπατος γύρω από την πόλη, που αναγνωρίζει τα σημάδια...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Día natural de ordenación de la ciencia con 
respecto a la seguridad de tráfico. Visita del policía local, 
caminata alrededor de la ciudad, reconociendo muestras...</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sicherheit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verkehr</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">natürlicher Wissenschaft Tag</string>
